Welcome to UCLA Identity & Access Management

Sign in to Manage your Digital Identity

UCLA Identity & Access Management lays out information, settings, and resources available to you to quickly review - including your profile on campus, accounts, and a growing catalog of services. You can either update information in the app, or be directed to where you can request information be changed.
